The P Debugger System¶

P offers an extended version of console.log, which allows you to send different kinds of messages. In the near future, you will be able to disable any or all of the P logger messages.

Logging a Notice¶

P.log.notice("Hello World!");

Logging a Warning¶

P.log.warning("Warning World!");

Logging an Error¶

P.log.error("Error World!");
